data.name: The one who pulls out the sword will be crowned king Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The one who pulls out the sword will be crowned king's original soundtrack, composed by Alejandro Maciá.

Includes the singed title, the sword theme and the coronation theme.

If you liked the game, consider buying the soundtrack to support our work!
